channel.title: Adlai Chandrasekhar on ₿itcoin Transcripts
channel.description: Recent content in Adlai Chandrasekhar on ₿itcoin Transcripts

item.title: Joinmarket
item.description: https://twitter.com/kanzure/status/784681036504522752 slides: https://scalingbitcoin.org/milan2016/presentations/D1%20-%202%20-%20Adlai%20Chandrasekhar.pdf Finding a risk-free rate for Bitcoin Joinmarket, just to clear up a misconception… Joinmarket, like bitcoin, it is a protocol. Not a company. The protocol is defined by an open-source reference implementation. There are other versions of the code out there. It’s entirely, I guess you could say it’s voluntary like bitcoin. Those of you who might have less of a finance background might not be familiar with the term risk-free rate.
